sqlMap.select:
select a.id as keyword_id,a.name as keyword_name,a.category_id,b.name as category_name,b.description,a.create_time,a.tag,a.executable,'cagegoryTagGrid' as fromgrid,a.allowtag from spreader.tb_keyword a left join spreader.tb_category b on a.category_id = b.id
order by a.create_time desc
limit $lit.offset$,$lit.maxRows$
select kw.name from tb_keyword kw inner join tb_category ca on kw.category_id = ca.id where ca.name = #categoryName#

select a.id as keyword_id,a.name as keyword_name,a.category_id,b.name as category_name,b.description,a.create_time,a.tag,a.executable,'cagegoryNotTagGrid' as fromgrid,a.allowtag from spreader.tb_keyword a left join spreader.tb_category b on a.category_id = b.id where ifnull(a.category_id,0) <> -1 and ifnull(a.category_id,0) <> #categoryId#
a.name like CONCAT('%',#keywordName#,'%')
and a.executable = true and a.allowtag = true order by a.create_time desc
limit $lit.offset$,$lit.maxRows$

select count(a.id) as cnt from tb_keyword a left join tb_category b on a.category_id = b.id where ifnull(a.category_id,0) <> -1 and ifnull(a.category_id,0) <> #categoryId#
a.name like CONCAT('%',#keywordName#,'%')
and a.executable = true and a.allowtag = true
select count(a.id) as cnt from spreader.tb_keyword a left join spreader.tb_category b on a.category_id = b.id

select k.id keyword_id,k.name keyword_name,cg.id category_id,cg.name category_name from spreader.tb_content_keyword ck left join spreader.tb_keyword k on ck.keyword_id = k.id left join tb_category cg on k.category_id = cg.id where ck.content_id = #contentId#

select id,name,category_id,tag,create_time,executable,allowtag from spreader.tb_keyword where category_id in
#categories[]#

select distinct category_id from spreader.tb_keyword where id in
#keywordIds[]#

select kw.id from spreader.tb_keyword kw inner join spreader.tb_category ca on kw.category_id = ca.id where ca.name
#categories[]#

select id from spreader.tb_keyword where name
#keywords[]#
select kw.id from spreader.tb_user_tag ut join spreader.tb_keyword kw on ut.tag_id = kw.id where ut.uid = #uid#
select keyword_id from spreader.tb_content_keyword where content_id = #contentId#
select k.id from spreader.tb_keyword k join spreader.tb_category cg on k.category_id = cg.id where cg.name like CONCAT('%',#category#,'%')
select k.id From tb_keyword k where k.name like CONCAT('%',#keyword#,'%');
